channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: He May Have Pulled The Trigger, But Charlie Kirk’s Suspected Killer Didn’t ‘Act Alone’
item.description: The alleged 'radicalized' assassin did not get to this moment on his own. Investigation details show a young man steeped in leftist dogma.

item.title: The Amon Carter Museum Flops in East-Meets-West Exhibition
item.description: It rambles, detours, and disserves the good art in the show, but there are so many wonders elsewhere in the museum.

item.title: Trump wants 'major' Russian sanctions if NATO does likewise and stops buying Russian oil
item.description: President Trump said he's ready to place sanctions on Russia as long as NATO allies agree to do the same, as he continues to rail against the war betw...

item.title: Trump praises Kash Patel for 33 hour capture of Kirk shooter
item.description: President Trump applauded FBI Director Kash Patel for catching the shooter who killed conservative activist Charlie Kirk.

item.title: The Federal Charge in the Brutal Charlotte Murder May Not Survive
item.description: A state murder case, by contrast, would be a slam dunk.

item.title: GLAAD Smears Charlie Kirk, Puts Target On Back Of Other Conservative Activists
item.description: A GLAAD spokesman claimed Kirk used 'lies and vitriol about transgender people' as a 'frequent part of his rhetoric and events.'

item.title: Is a Revolution Brewing in ‘Middle England’?
item.description: Far out of public view, a new form of conservatism, drawing on old wisdom, is taking shape. It may soon take the nation by storm.

item.title: Radical Feminism Has Its Hooks in Young Women of Both Parties
item.description: A new poll of Gen Zers about life priorities reveals some startling results.

item.title: School district cuts 'mental health' opt-out for girls seeking to avoid biological boys in restrooms
item.description: A California school district has dumped its hotly contested policy offering a "mental health accommodation" for girls seeking to avoid sharing locker ...

item.title: ‘Don’t Mourn His Death’: Tennessee High School Teacher Allegedly Mocks Charlie Kirk’s Assassination
item.description: 'Guess there wasn’t a good guy with a gun there. Shame,' Franklin High School teacher Emily Orbison sneeringly wrote on Instagram, sources say.

item.title: California lawmakers to decide on extending key climate program and boosting grid reliability
item.description: The fate of a key California climate program Gov. Gavin Newsom has championed as a crucial tool to respond to the Trump administration's environmental...

item.title: Judge extends temporary measures protecting Guatemalan children from deportation
item.description: A federal judge is temporarily keeping in place measures preventing the Trump administration from deporting Guatemalan migrant children in government ...

item.title: All The Companies That Advertised On The MSNBC Segment Blaming Charlie Kirk For His Own Death
item.description: Numerous companies, including Pfizer, The Economist, and P&G brands, ran advertisements on Katy Tur Reports on MSNBC Wednesday, during which Tur and o...

item.title: In Such Times, We Need Law, Civil Discourse, and Normal Politics More Than Ever
item.description: The killing of Charlie Kirk will be a radicalizing moment but should not alter our commitment to the American Way.

item.title: Murders Rise As Publishing Houses Sell Violent LGBT Fantasies To Kids
item.description: The publishing industry is cranking out books based on the murderous nihilism of the trans community and marketing them to kids.
